page.title: 04HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: South Ockendon health centre has been operational 35 years.On the 15th of July 1985 the centre was visited by a number of pupils.A number of interviews were conducted including nurses and doctors. One of the nurses said"I have a little room where I treat the patients with minor complaints. If I cannot treat the problem I send them to Doctor Ahmed. The Doctor was interviewed while a patient was with him.He asked the patient what was the matter and she replied that the small girl with her had a stomach ache.The Doctor had a look at her and said she was suffering from growing pains.He gave her a perscription.The Doctor interviewed many patients and seemed to be very busy.
